commits.subject: feat: add Timing tab with hour and day-of-week charts
commits.body:
Add new Timing tab to dashboard visualizing when work happens:
- Commits by Hour chart (0-23) with work hours highlighting
- Commits by Day of Week chart (Mon-Sun) with weekend distinction
- Timezone toggle (Local/UTC) for time display preferences

commits.subject: docs: add discovery framework validation session
commits.body:
Applied Discovery Framework to validate solution against user needs:
- Identified two distinct audiences (Executive vs Dev Manager)
- Key gap: timestamp visualization (when work happens)
- Key gap: audience-specific views (exec needs summary)
- Reorganized TODO.md around discovered priorities

New files:
- docs/DISCOVERY_SESSION.md - full session documentation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>

commits.subject: feat: implement tag-based extraction with complexity scoring
commits.body:
Phase 1 - extract.js:
- Add CONVENTIONAL_TO_TAG mapping (feat→feature, fix→bugfix, etc.)
- parseCommitMessage() returns tags[] array instead of single type
- Add calculateComplexity() function (1-5 scale)
- Summary outputs tagBreakdown and complexityBreakdown
- Contributors/files track tagCounts instead of types

Phase 4 - aggregate.js:
- Tag-aware aggregation with tagCounts
- Summary outputs tagBreakdown and complexityBreakdown
- Monthly aggregation tracks tags per month

Data regenerated for repo-tor with new format.
Docs updated (USER_GUIDE, HISTORY, SESSION_NOTES, TODO).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>

commits.subject: feat: add multi-tag support to dashboard
commits.body:
- Replace single type field with tags[] array model
- Add TAG_COLORS and tag helper functions (getCommitTags, getAllTags, getTagColor, getTagClass)
- Rename "Type" filter to "Tag" filter (matches any tag)
- Show all tags on commits (up to 3 with overflow indicator)
- Rename "By Type" tab to "By Tag" tab
- Update Progress tab Feature vs Bug Fix for tag-based counting
- Update combineDataFiles() to build tagBreakdown

Dashboard expects tags[] field - will show "other" until extraction is updated.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>

commits.subject: docs: refocus on tag-based analytics with AI-driven extraction
commits.body:
Shift tool focus to three core metrics:
- When: timestamp analytics (hour, day, work hours, weekends)
- What: AI-analyzed tags from commit messages (multiple per commit)
- Complexity: score based on files changed + tag count

Add EXTRACTION_PLAYBOOK.md with "feed the chicken" trigger phrase.
Reorganize TODO.md around new direction (Foundation → Views → Polish).
Remove completed items from TODO (tracked in HISTORY.md).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>

commits.subject: Merge pull request #9 from devmade-ai/claude/add-todo-timestamp-views-9u4BW
commits.body: docs: add feature roadmap for timestamp views, filters, design, and privacy

commits.subject: docs: add research items for commit model improvements
commits.body:
New Research/Investigation section in TODO.md:

1. Device/Platform Attribution
   - Split contributions by committer name (mobile vs desktop)
   - Config mapping for name variations with device tags

2. AI-Powered Commit Categorization
   - Claude reads commit messages + diffs to understand intent
   - Auto-tagging beyond conventional commit types
   - Confidence scores and human override

3. Multi-Tag Commit Model
   - One commit can have multiple tags (feat + refactor + docs)
   - Schema change from single type to tags[] with weights
   - Backward compatibility with existing data

4. Tag-Centric Reporting
   - Shift focus from commit counts to accomplishments
   - Effort weighting based on complexity
   - Activity vs output distinction

commits.subject: chore: update extracted data
commits.body:
Re-extracted all 4 repositories:
- social-ad-creator: 156 commits
- model-pear: 302 commits
- repo-tor: 50 commits (+7 new)
- chatty-chart: 42 commits

Total: 550 commits across 4 repos

commits.subject: docs: add work hours vs after-hours distinction to roadmap
commits.body:
Renamed "Weekend & Holiday Visual Distinction" to "Work Pattern Visual Distinction"

Added time-of-day items:
- Work hours highlighting (8:00-17:00)
- After-hours styling for commits outside work window
- Hour charts integration with work hours band
- Configurable hours setting (default 8-17)

Updated cross-cutting items:
- Heatmap now shows work hours rows + weekend columns
- Commit badges include "After Hours" option

commits.subject: docs: add hour/day commit views and weekend/holiday distinction
commits.body:
Timestamp Views additions:
- Commits by hour (0-23 bar chart)
- Commits by day of week (Mon-Sun bar chart)

New Weekend & Holiday Visual Distinction section:
- Weekend highlighting across ALL tabs/views
- South African public holidays with distinct styling
- Holiday data source (config/API)
- Legend/key for workday vs weekend vs holiday
- Integration points: Timeline, heatmap, commit list badges
